changeSet.sql: create or replace view SPECIMEN_EXTN_RECORDS_VIEW as ( select re.OBJECT_ID as SPECIMEN_ID, re.RECORD_ID as RECORD_ID from CATISSUE_FORM_RECORD_ENTRY re inner join CATISSUE_FORM_CONTEXT fc on fc.IDENTIFIER = re.FORM_CTXT_ID where (fc.ENTITY_TYPE = 'Specimen' or fc.ENTITY_TYPE = 'SpecimenEvent') and re.ACTIVITY_STATUS = 'ACTIVE' )

changeSet.sql: create or replace view USER_VIEW as ( select u.IDENTIFIER as IDENTIFIER, u.FIRST_NAME as FIRST_NAME, u.LAST_NAME AS LAST_NAME, u.EMAIL_ADDRESS AS EMAIL_ADDRESS, concat(u.LAST_NAME, ', ', u.FIRST_NAME) as NAME, d.NAME AS DEPARTMENT_NAME from CATISSUE_USER u inner join CATISSUE_DEPARTMENT d ON u.DEPARTMENT_ID = d.IDENTIFIER )
